title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas
text_raw:
1. 

(a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas 
(Amendment) and Variation of Days and Hours (Carrickmacross 
and Monaghan) Order 2021. 

(b) This Order shall come into operation on 1st November, 2021
text_norm: 1 (a) order may cited district court district area (amendment) variation day hour (carrickmacross monaghan) order 2021 (b) order shall come operation 1st november 2021

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5
text_raw:
2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5 

of 1961), is hereby amended by – 

(a) 

the substitution at reference number 197 for the matter in column 
(4) of the following: 

“Carrickmacross— First, Second, Third and Fourth Monday in 
each month. All sittings at 10.30 a.m.”, and 

(b) 

the substitution at reference number 200 for the matter in column 
(4) of the following: 

“Monaghan— First, Second, Third and Fourth Wednesday in 
each month. Third Tuesday in each month. All sittings at 10.30 
a.m.”
text_norm: 2 first schedule district court (areas) order 1961 (s.i no 5 1961) hereby amended - (a) substitution reference number 197 matter column (4) following carrickmacross-- first second third fourth monday month sitting 10.30 a.m (b) substitution reference number 200 matter column (4) following monaghan-- first second third fourth wednesday month third tuesday month sitting 10.30 a.m

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 3. The Second Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No.
text_raw:
3. The Second Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 

5 of 1961), is hereby amended by – 

(a) 

the substitution at reference number 167 for the matter in column 
(4) of the following: 

“Carrickmacross— First, Second, Third and Fourth Monday in 
each month. All sittings at 10.30 a.m.”, and 

(b) 

the substitution at reference number 170 for the matter in column 
(4) of the following: 

“Monaghan— First, Second, Third and Fourth Wednesday in 
each month. Third Tuesday in each month. All sittings at 10.30 
a.m.” 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st September, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not 
completed before commencement of this Order shall be continued and 
completed as if this Order had been in force at the time at which such business 
had been initiated. 

[467] 3 

GIVEN under the Seal of the Courts Service 
 15 September 2021 

PAUL KELLY, 
 Member of the Board of the Courts Service authorised to sign 

documents under the Seal of the Courts Service. 

MICHELLE JOHNSON, 
 Officer of the Courts Service designated for the purpose of 

authenticating the Seal of the Courts Service, pursuant to section 
10 of the Courts Service Act 1998. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [467]

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order provides for the variation of Days and Hours at Carrickmacross and 
Monaghan. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [467] 5
